original_text: Jesus turned round and he looked at his disciples. He said that Peter was not saying good things. He said to Peter, ‘ Satan, go away from me! Your thoughts do not come from God. Instead, you are thinking like men think.’
korean_text: 예수께서 돌이키사 제자들을 보시며 베드로를 꾸짖어 이르시되 사탄아 내 뒤로 물러가라 네가 하나님의 일을 생각하지 아니하고 도리어 사람의 일을 생각하는도다 하시고

sentences.original_text: and he looked at his disciples
He said that Peter was not saying good things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 베드로가 좋은 말을 하지 않고 있다고 말씀하셨다

sentences.original_text: Your thoughts do not come from God
sentences.korean_translation: 네 생각들은 하나님께로부터 온 것이 아니다

sentences.original_text: Instead, you are thinking like men think
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에 너는 사람들이 생각하는 것처럼 생각하고 있다
